org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman

Class PropagatedTrackState

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman.PropagatedTrackState

  • public class PropagatedTrackState
extends Object
    Code to propagate an HPS track state to a given plane, through the non-uniform field. All of the internal methods used are from the Kalman package.
